name: Valentine Bill
description:
Full of life and action, I have a vibrant personality,Good sense of humor.. sincere, trustworthy, loyal, caring, loving, understanding, sensitive, and a romantic (.wow that was a mouth full but it’s true ) I do take pride in my appearance, and believe in treating people the same way as I would like to be treated. I can be spontaneous, thoughtful and enjoy most things in life, always willing to try new things. Like to keep myself fit and healthy, Gym, Bush walks, Mountain Biking & Trail riding, off cause the beach, out doors type room for quite nights, candle lite dinners with nice music, a glass of wine, conversation or BBQ, a cold beer and good company.I am retired and i could be away from home sometimes because i have my jewelry store and settling down when i find the right woman. Like to meet a woman who takes pride in themselves and feels comfortable in a pair of jeans & shorts, tee shirt as in a gown and heels but am mostly into the inner character of that person. I’m sincere in my search and not into playing games. I do enjoy my own company and quite happy to do my own thing as well sharing of moments.
I am seeking and looking for true love with a woman…I am seeking and looking for serious and honest relationship…I am looking for a soul mate, a lover, a wife, a true friend all in one to spend the rest of my life with.
